msq.en: Main Scenario Quest reward for completing '{0}' (lv. {1}).

quest.en: Complete the quest '{0}' (lv. {1}) from {2} in {3} (x: {4}, y: {5}).

achievement.en: Earn the __achievement__ achievement, then speak to {0} in {1} (x: {2}, y: 3) to claim your reward.

beastTribe.en: Achieve {0} reputation with the {1} Beast Tribe, then purchase for {2} {3} from {4} in {5} (x: {6}, y: {7}).

fate.en: Achieve gold rating in the FATE '{0}' (lv. {1}), found in {2} (x: {3}, y: {4}).

fateSeries.en: Complete all FATEs in the '{0}' series with a gold rating, starting from '' (lv. 30) (x: {1}, y: {2}).

fateSeriesPurchase.en: Complete all FATEs in the '{0}' series with a gold rating, starting from '{1}' (lv. {2}) (x: {3}, y: {4}), and then purchase from {5} in {6} (x: {7}, y: {8}).

treasureVault.en: Randomly awarded from treasure chests in {0}, from vault {1} onwards.

seasonalQuest.en: Complete the {0} {1} event quest '{2}' (lv. {3}) from {4} in {5} (x: {6}, y: {7})

seasonalPurchase.en: Purchase for {0} {1} from {2} {3} in {4} (x: {5}, y: {6}) during the {7} event.

mogstation.fr: Disponible à l'achat à partir du {0}.

premium.en: Purchase {0} from the {1} and redeem the promotional code on or before {2}.

fadedDuty.de: Verblaßtes Material, das nach dem Zufallsprinzip aus der letzten Truhe in der Pflicht '{0}' (lv. {1}) erhalten wurde.
fadedDuty.en: Faded material randomly obtained from the final chest in the duty '{0}' (lv. {1}).
fadedDuty.fr: Matériau dégradé obtenu aléatoirement à partir du coffre final dans le devoir '{0}' (lv. {1}).

fadedExploratory.en: Faded material randomly obtained from {0} Voyages to {1} and above.

fadedHunt.en: Faded material randomly obtained from {0} Rank Hunts in {1}.

fadedPurchase.en: Faded material purchased for {0} {1} from {2} {3} in {4} (x: {5}, y: {6}).

fadedTreasureMap.en: Faded material randomly obtained from {0} Treasure Maps.

fadedTrial.de: Verblassendes Material, das zufällig aus dem Versuch '{0}' (lv. {1}) erhalten wurde.
fadedTrial.en: Faded material randomly obtained from the trial '{0}' (lv. {1}).
